title.narrative: Technical and financial support of trained radio for the production of content in Cote d'Ivoire

description.narrative: As Results. - 27 radio contents (14 magazines and 13 debates) were produced by 14 radio stations. 66.67% of the topics developed in the magazines and debates were related to women's participation in local affairs - 110 speakers in magazines and debates, (12.5% were local elected officials, and none religious leaders) were represented. Local elected officials are opening-up to take part in public debates at local level and in community radios on issues related to women's rights.

The 15 local radio stations trained in the first quarter were to continue producing magazines and debates on women's rights, under the technical supervision of URPCI, the national community radio umbrella organization. 30 productions were expected, including 15 magazines and 15 debates.
